onna lamayi.kathawa genawa.mage parighanaka rajaya kadila.ithin ada thaththage eken thamayi me kathawa danne.badadata kathawa danna puluwan tharam uthsaha karanawa.barima wunoth brahaspathinda aniwaryenma danawa hode.

aththatama eya kiyanakal man me sinduwa ahala thibuneth na.
namuth wiwahayen pasuwa mawaka lesa biridaka lesa ituwiya yuthu wagakim siyalla samaga ee gana wisheshayen hithuwa.
ra thisse nidi marala mal kada kada idala dan methana awith doyi.
boliwud puwath wartha karanne, eya boliwud rasika rasikawan umathu karawanu athi bawayi.
me awasthawe rauwulayi kandayi dekama beragatha yuthuwa athi bawa penennata thibe.
ithin onna apitath mahaththayo wijepalaya katha kala waren kiyala.
dada gahana tharamata aanduwe pokattu pirena nisa mowunda ada kitayan wenuwata maduruwan bowiya hakiya’yi anumana kota dada gasana thanata pathwa atha.
ese wuwath, thaththath samanga wishrama giya eha gedara botheju ankal ge jiwithaya eeta hathpasin ma wenas wiya.
